name: food-delivery-platform
description: A complete food delivery platform with customer app, cook app, and admin portal

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:customer" "npm run dev:cook" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd customer-app && npm install && cd ../cook-app && npm install && cd ../admin-portal && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:customer && npm run build:cook && npm run build:admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd customer-app && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../cook-app && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../admin-portal && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.deploy:rules: cd firebase && firebase deploy --only firestore:rules,storage:rules --project hometaste-aaba7
